channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
Hey guys I'm kinda new at this and I did some server edits (changing item stats, adding in a command.) and Every single time I try to compile I get this error 'The system cannot find the path specified.' 'unrecognized option: -d' 'error: could not create java virtual machine.' 'error: A fatal exception has occured. program will now exit.'
Please send me a new compiling code or anything to help! I do have java downloaded and updated and it still didn't work. I have windows 7 64 bit. Here is my compiling code. @echo off title compile cd ../src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Dylan.934 Dylan.934
item.description:
@Dylan.934 wrote:

Hey guys I’m kinda new at this and I did some server edits (changing item stats, adding in a command.) and Every single time I try to compile I get this error ‘The system cannot find the path specified.’ ‘unrecognized option: -d’ ‘error: could not create java virtual machine.’ ‘error: A fatal exception has occured. program will now exit.’

Please send me a new compiling code or anything to help! I do have java downloaded and updated and it still didn’t work. I have windows 7 64 bit. Here is my compiling code.
@echo off
title compile
cd …/src
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

Read full topic
